name: Roo.menu.MenuMgr
desc: Provides a common registry of all menu items on a page so that they can be easily accessed by id.

methods.name: hideAll
methods.desc: Hides all menus that are currently visible

params.name: menu
params.desc:
The string menu id, an existing menu object reference, or a Menu config that will
be used to generate and return a new Menu instance.
